Drawings

A drawing as an object of creation something deeply important to me. As long as I can remember I have worked through ideas on paper with pen or pencil; manifesting my internal world of ideas externally for anyone to experience.

Until recently, I have always considered the act of producing a drawing to be a deeply human act. Something maybe some Elephants or Monkeys can attempt, but which requires something unique to homo sapiens. Hoewver, this is simply not the case

Jonathan Hudak © 2023
